about_the_game: This short demo shows off the UI and story telling elements. It follows the main character mysteriously awaking on a beach. While the storyline is unrelated to the main game, it follows the same theme and writing style!
detailed_description: This short demo shows off the UI and story telling elements. It follows the main character mysteriously awaking on a beach. While the storyline is unrelated to the main game, it follows the same theme and writing style!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Intel 64 bit/Apple silicon
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Intel 64 bit/Apple silicon

name: Rainbow Heights Academy: Year 1 Demo

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Test run the RHA Year 1 Demo to get a feel for the story telling, pacing and UI elements
